question: Which specialised agency of UN recently signed a MOU with the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies (IFRC) on Emergency medical teams?
explanation: The World Health Organization(WHO) recently signed a MOU with the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies (IFRC) on Emergency medical teams . The MoU, known as the Red Channel Agreement, is the culmination of years of cooperation between IFRC and the WHO Emergency Medical Team Initiative.
